arts.ttl: Lecce vs Napoli: the midweek round begins
arts.sum: The two sides have met 20 times in Lecce, with honours relatively even: the Giallorossi have claimed five victories (most recently a 2-1 triumph in the 2010/11 campaign), eight fixtures have ended level (the last being a 1-1 stalemate in 2008/09), while the Partenopei have prevailed on seven occasions (including a 2-0 success in the 2024/25 season). Lecce host Napoli at the Via del Mare as they look to bounce back from their defeat against Udinese, which brought an end to their three-game unbeaten run.

arts.ttl: Serie A: Lecce vs. Napoli – probable line-ups and where to watch on TV
